column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=SP :
#Text=The future is only peace .
#Text=The problem is how long will it take and how many victims will it call for .
#Text=Why do I say peace ?
#Text=Because when you look historically , at the development of humanity , most of our lives we are living on the land .
#Text=The history is written with red ink .
#Text=The reason for it is because people were fighting for our land , either defending it or extending it , because that was the main source .
#Text=The land , the natural resources , the markets , all these go together .
#Text=The minute the land was replaced by science , what is there to fight about ?
#Text=Armies cannot conquer science .

#Text=Customs cannot check what a scientist has in his mind , they can see what he has in his pocket but not what he has in his mind so it ’s uncontrolled ; it means that borders are n’t important and distances are n’t important .
#Text=DS : How do you approach the difficult challenge of talking to the Palestinians when , in the end , they do n’t want Israel to exist .
#Text=How do you come to an understanding to make peace possible ?
#Text=SP : Well , what is the problem ? I mean , is the problem national , say between Jews and Arabs ; or is it a matter of generations between an old age and a new age ?
#Text=You see , the terrorists are protesting against modernity .
#Text=They think that modernity may endanger their tradition .
#Text=They are simply afraid and hate modernity .
#Text=They consider modernity as their enemy , but then they have two problems .
#Text=First of all , can they exist on tradition ? They cannot .
#Text=Sooner or later they will have to enter the new age .
#Text=All the talks about nationalities , etcetera , well , the new age has very little patience for history .
#Text=History is becoming more and more irrelevant .
#Text=DS : How do you feel about that ?
#Text=SP : Well , I distinguish between two histories , the spiritual and the material .
#Text=Or the history of events and the history of values .
#Text=The history of values is okay because wisdom is ageless ; it does n’t grow old , like material .
#Text=But events are totally unimportant for 2 reasons .
#Text=First , the event is unimportant .
#Text=Tell me , what events is today important such as how many elephants Hannibal had on the Alps , when you can have helicopters ?
#Text=Why should I bother my children with all this nonsense ?
#Text=What sort of a nose did Cleopatra have ?
#Text=God , I do n’t know !
#Text=You can invite people to war over noses , but nobody will go to fight for noses any more .
#Text=On the other hand , there are already machines that can replace our memory .
#Text=Why should I bother my child with memory when he can buy a computer that will remember everything you asked him to remember ?
